name: Poacher (itch)
description:
2147. Space travel is now a reality, and people are more and more curious about new world and new alien species. You’re a poacher and your objective is to sell monsters or their parts to the black market. Since a lot of poachers died trying to capture those aliens you use a remote controlled robot, savaged from the police. But be careful, space poaching is an illegal activity, and the authorities won’t let you do this undisturbed.

DEVELOPED BY:

TEAM A - PADUA (EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL PADUA, YEAR 2, 2019/2020)
